data.eml:eml: A new genus and three new species of Nothopodinae (Acari: Eriophyidae) from Guangxi, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, De-Wei, Wang, Guo-Quan, Wei, Sui-Gai (2010): A new genus and three new species of Nothopodinae (Acari: Eriophyidae) from Guangxi, China. Zootaxa 2452: 44-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.195231
